Package io.janusproject.kernel.bic

Implementation of the Built-in Capacities provided by the Janus platform.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    InternalEventBusCapacity
    Capacity that provides an event bus to notify the different components of an agent.
    MicroKernelCapacity
    Capacity that provides an access to the micro kernel, according to the FIPA specs.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BuiltinCapacityUtil
    Utilities that are dedicated to the built-in capacities.
    StandardBuiltinCapacitiesProvider
    Provider of the built-in capacities of the Janus platform.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    InternalEventBusCapacity.OwnerState
    Describe the states of the owner of an event bus.

Package io.janusproject.kernel.bic Description

Implementation of the Built-in Capacities provided by the Janus platform.
